dmca.title: Travel Website Requests Removal of Mirroring Site (#1)
dmca.body:
Kasbah.com Limited
[Private]
[Private]
Lancashire FY8 IPS
United Kingdom
Tel - (+44) xxxxx xxxxxx
Fax - (+44) xxxxx xxxxxx
Email - [Private]@kasbah.com
Company No. 04351240
Vat No. 823 349922

Google,Inc
Attn: Customer Support,
DMCA Complaints
[Private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

9th Feb 2004

Dear Sir/Madam

It has come to our attention that the domain www.ducoon.net is displaying a virtual mirrored copy of our site We have made an effort to contact the owner to no avail and to cause us further concern their page Rank is increasing and they are starting to appear in some travel related search results -They have a Google ad sense scheme running which was started recently. I have attached a list of some the offending pages this list is not exhausted.

We have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

A speedy response would be appreciated.  I am sure you can understand our reason for distress

Regards

[Private]

e-mail [Private]@kasbah.com

2

ATTCH: Google/Ducoon.net/02
